name: Siberia Station Spa
description: A tranquil outdoor spa offering Nordic baths, massages, and relaxation areas in a serene forest setting.

name: Strøm Spa Nordique
description: An upscale spa featuring Nordic baths, massages, and gourmet cuisine in a luxurious environment.

name: Skyspa Québec
description: A rooftop spa offering saunas, baths, massages, and stunning views of the city.

name: Le Monastère des Augustines
description: A wellness retreat offering holistic health services, spa treatments, and a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Spa des Neiges
description: A relaxing spa with outdoor baths, saunas, and a variety of massage options in a riverside location.

name: Spa Scandinave Vieux-Montréal
description: A luxurious Scandinavian-inspired spa offering hot baths, saunas, massages, and a stunning view of the Old Port.
address: 71 Rue de la Commune O, Montréal, QC H2Y 2C6

description: A unique floating spa on a boat offering water circuits, massages, and panoramic views of Montreal’s skyline.
address: 358 Rue de la Commune O, Montréal, QC H2Y 2E2

name: Balnea Spa
description: A luxurious spa offering an array of wellness treatments, hot and cold baths, saunas, and nature walks.

name: Le Spa William Gray
description: An upscale urban spa offering relaxation and rejuvenation treatments with stunning views of Old Montreal.

name: Auberge Godefroy Spa
description: A relaxing retreat offering luxurious spa treatments, a hydrotherapy circuit, and a peaceful ambiance.
